/* com.innobiz.orange.web.ap.dao.ApOngoFormTxtDDao.selectApOngoFormTxtD */
SELECT
M.*, (SELECT RESC_VA FROM PT_RESC_B WHERE RESC_ID = (SELECT RESC_ID FROM PT_CD_B WHERE CLS_CD = 'FORM_TXT_TYP_CD' AND CD = M.FORM_TXT_TYP_CD) AND LANG_TYP_CD = NVL(#{queryLang, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'ko')) FORM_TXT_TYP_NM,
FROM (
SELECT
* FROM (SELECT N.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM (SELECT
T.FORM_ID, T.FORM_SEQ, T.FORM_TXT_TYP_CD, T.TXT_CONT, T.TXT_FONT_VA, T.TXT_STYL_VA, T.TXT_SIZE, T.TXT_COLR_VA,
(SELECT RESC_VA FROM PT_RESC_B WHERE RESC_ID = (SELECT RESC_ID FROM PT_CD_B WHERE CLS_CD = 'FORM_TXT_TYP_CD' AND CD = T.FORM_TXT_TYP_CD) AND LANG_TYP_CD = NVL(#{queryLang, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'ko')) FORM_TXT_TYP_NM,
FROM AP_ONGO_FORM_TXT_D T
AND T.FORM_ID = #{formId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND T.FORM_SEQ = #{formSeq, jdbcType=INTEGER} AND T.FORM_TXT_TYP_CD = #{formTxtTypCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ${whereSqllet}
ORDER BY ${orderBy} ORDER BY T.FORM_ID, T.FORM_SEQ, T.FORM_TXT_TYP_CD
) N WHERE ROWNUM <= #{pageNo, jdbcType=NUMERIC} * #{pageRowCnt, jdbcType=NUMERIC}) WHERE RNUM > (#{pageNo, jdbcType=NUMERIC} - 1) * #{pageRowCnt, jdbcType=NUMERIC} ) M
